data.title: Don't misinterpret AI orders as an exploit on dedicated servers anymore.
data.body: Fixes #2540 and also cleans up bot slots when admins leave to prevent them becoming uncontrollable from the next client who joins.

data.title: Save areas of the map
data.body:
Here is a mockup image I have made :
![744383ScreenShot001](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/1732773/340398/67d4ab42-9d4f-11e2-8812-31166abc40cb.png)

(note that to fit the minimap size, buttons (which look like tabs) should be a bit smaller)

There could be new icons next to the minimap:
- clicking on the " + " button would record the current position of the view and add a new "button" with a digit to quickly go to this position later
- clicking on the " - " button would remove a previously recorded position (the player would have to select it first before being able to click on the " - " button)
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/136843-save-areas-of-the-map?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Don't perform keyboard orders on destroyed actors which crashes the game.
data.body: This should fix #2947 and #2328.

data.title: Don't render empty remaining tick bars for iron curtain / chrono
data.body: For some reason in C# float = 0 / value is not 0f? Anyway this fixes it. @ScottNZ complained about in IRC and it was ugly because it greyed out the top selection edges.

data.title: Use the correct FreeType DLL file name on Windows
data.body: Fixes #2946 @ScottNZ please review, thanks to @RobMaister for the quick response.

data.title: Cursor Palette Refactor
data.body: Fixes #2885 as @pchote suggested if I understood him correctly.

data.title: Added the ProximityCaptor: to the default.ymal to make ProximityCapture fully working in TD.
data.body:
Was making a TD map but wanted some buildings to be capturable by some range and saw that it wasnt working but it is fully working in RA so I took a view at both Default.ymal and saw that TD doesn't have it.

^Vehicle:
    ProximityCaptor:
        Types:Vehicle

^Tank:
    ProximityCaptor:
        Types:Tank

^Helicopter:
    ProximityCaptor:
        Types:Helicopter

^Infantry:
    ProximityCaptor:
        Types:Infantry

^CivInfantry:
    ProximityCaptor:
        Types:CivInfantry

And so on...

Here is the ymal for TD with the ProximityCaptor: for almost Actors types:
http://pastebin.com/qy4Bhyw5

data.title: Streamline spectator shroud detection and rendering detection a bit
data.body:
Fixes #2940 and removes the hard-coded observer detection to local player and shellmap. For Cloak.cs and InvisibleToEnemy.cs I still provide a backfall to World.LocalPlayer if Shroud is null. Don't know if this is still required.

There are some other minor glitches left because #2759 is incomplete. Ranks are rendered even when the unit is HiddenUnderFog in spectator mode. The same applies for the rank-up and cash tick effect as well as building animations.

data.title: Gap Generator and friends should stop spinning when low on power
balance stick - infantry, mammoth
data.body:
During playtesting it seemed like having infantry go at full speed on clear terrain was a good addition.
If it seems inappropriate for some infantry, can change it individually later for some units that might be too fast (e.g. flamethrowers and grenadiers, who travel at speed=5).

Mammoth tank turret rotation speed increased to 3, matching its rotation speed. Seems like a good idea so that mammoth is more reliable as GDI's heavy anti-air unit.

data.title: Unable to load DLL 'freetype.dll': The specified module could not be found.

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body: #2943 only solved it for Mac. Windows will still not find the right FreeType DLL when using the file naming provided from http://gnuwin32.sourceforge.net/packages/freetype.htm. Waiting for upstream at @RobMaister to resolve this.

data.title: fixes #2941 -  dump fields in syncreport
data.body:
Please review.

Syncreport now looks like this:
https://gist.github.com/bidifx/339701dae356425ec2aa

data.title: Admins are not reported as players to master server on non-dedicated hosts
data.body: In current bleed I created a new game, but http://master.open-ra.org/list.php reported it as empty with 0 players. This might have been broken by @xai in #2684 when he tried to fix #2564 for dedicated servers, but broke it for regular hosts.

milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.title: Changing diplomacy stance does not update shroud properly

milestone.title: release-20131223
milestone.description: The next stable release should not have obvious glitches or horrible crasher bugs left.

data.body:
In Fragile Alliance mode when you change your stance to enemies after being allied:

![fragile-alliance-shroud-bug](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/756669/320972/7c1d0c10-9981-11e2-9089-d73edf7516e5.png)

Blue is my mutual enemy there. Can be viewed live in this playtest-20130330 replay https://www.dropbox.com/s/zv11agn8sz6iu1v/OpenRA-2013-03-30T210530Z.rep

data.title: dump all synced fields in syncreport
data.body: Instead of only dumping the trait's type and hash all synced fields/properties should be dumped. The will allow an significantly improved debug workflow.

data.title: Mines are invisible when switching player shrouds in spectator mode
data.body: #2934 was incomplete, it only fixed it for cloaked units and mines for world observers.

data.title: Map editor broken under OSX / mono 2.10
data.body:
Introduced by a0bd6f0, looks like a bug in the winforms implementation.

```
paul@Odin:OpenRA+(a0bd6f0...)$ mono --debug OpenRA.Editor.exe ra
System.ArgumentException: A null reference or invalid value was found [GDI+ status: InvalidParameter]
  at System.Drawing.GDIPlus.CheckStatus (Status status) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush..ctor (Rectangle rect, Color color1, Color color2, LinearGradientMode linearGradientMode) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at (wrapper remoting-invoke-with-check) System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush:.ctor (System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientMode)
  at System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer.OnRenderToolStripPanelBackground (System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRenderEventArgs e) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer.DrawToolStripPanelBackground (System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanelRenderEventArgs e) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel.OnPaintBackground (System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs e) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Forms.Control.WmPaint (System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc (System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl.WndProc (System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.WndProc (System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Forms.Control+ControlWindowTarget.OnMessage (System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Forms.Control+ControlNativeWindow.WndProc (System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
  at System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow.WndProc (IntPtr hWnd, Msg msg, IntPtr wParam, IntPtr lParam) [0x00000] in <filename unknown>:0 
```

data.title: Fixes paratroopers revealing shroud after death
data.body: Fixes the most common occurrence of #2726 because the others don't even come with a proper reproducible test case. So it might not catch all shroud related glitches introduced by per-player shrouds and mobile gap generators. Took me ridiculously long to hunt this one down.

data.title: added "Force Desync" Cheat for debugging
data.body:
Added "Force Desync" Cheat for debugging.

Will be useful for developing CrashReporter and improving SyncReport.

data.title: Added durationbar indicators for iron curtain and chronoshift
data.body:
- added durationbar indicator for iron curtain, closes #2288
- added durationbar indicator for chronoshift, closes #2287

data.title: Fixes cloaked units invisible to spectators
data.body: Not sure when #2918 was introduced. The code was hard to understand for me, so I rewrote it during the bug fix. Also don't know where `InvisibleToEnemy:` trait is used.

data.title: Hotkey usability and conflict resolution
data.body:
- resolve hotkey conflicts, fixes #2883
- add/display existing in-game button hotkeys, fixes #2932

data.title: add hotkeys for increased usability
data.body:
I think this is a good idea to allow for easier use of menus in game.

The idea is:
esc = options
f1 = pause
f2 = diplomacy (or statistics in observer mode)
f3 = cheats
f4 = objectives
etc.

I hope these keys are not used for anything else :P

data.title: Throw specific exception on missing sound definitions
data.body: To help track down what crashed here: http://pastebin.com/EMimv0KB (reported by klaas on IRC).

data.title: Viceroid doesn't show control group number when selected
data.body:
On EvW3, you can build viceroids at the biolab, but if you assign them to a control group, the number is not rendered.

They otherwise _work_ in a control group, this is just a rendering glitch.

data.title: fix #2528 - crashy race in DemoTruck destruction
new maps; orca trail changed; msam icon; blue tree.shp
data.body:
3 new maps (1 new by psydev, 2 redux by psydev of other maps)
orca trail now nice flame effect instead of smokey (visuals looked spammy with smokey)
MSAM has its own proper icon
blue tiberium tree has its own .shp, so that it shows up in the map editor
